text: Super Bowl XXXIX was the thirty-ninth Super Bowl. The teams in the game were the Philadelphia Eagles from the NFC and the New England Patriots from the AFC. New England won the game 24-21. Paul McCartney performed in the halftime show. The game was played to take place on February 6, 2005. *039 Category:New England Patriots Category:2005 in sports Category:2005 in Florida
title: Super Bowl XXXIX
